basics.name: Vibha Havanur
basics.label: QA Engineer
basics.summary: QA Engineer, with an eye for meticulousness

aboutme.title: About me
aboutme.subtitle: in a few words...
items: A decade of experience in QA Practices
Quality Assurance, with an eye to details
Apricity Healthcare, MacMillan Learning, Texas.gov, Driver Records and more...

aboutme.title: What motivates me
aboutme.subtitle: when I wake up everyday...
items: And then there is always more to learn and share...

aboutme.title: What I seek
aboutme.subtitle: in a future that is present...
items: an opportunity to contribute to customer success
a team to work with exceptional leadership
an environment where work is an experience to live for

highlights: First QA hire, laid the foundation for a comprehensive QA Practice
Functional and regression Tests for UI and API using Cypress
Comprehensive test plan documentation and testing strategies
integrate test cases with Zephyr, including traceability matrix
detailed sprint cycle reports for executive team
integration testing with external systems like Health Gorilla, Square and Zendesk
evaluate COVID-19 risk factors as part of Apricity Return to Work application
collaborate with DevOps to execute automation scripts in AWS Build pipelines
use AI Tools to validate and refine patient care instructions with a human touch
collaborate with PM and Engineers to define story requirements
document test suites and develop automation and regression tests
Behavior Driven Test cases using Selenium, Cucumber, Gherkin
UI tests and Policy definitions to grade/ungrade subjects - Pre-Calc, Graph, AceEditor
multi-author test cases - Author, Preview and Student modes
Internal Common Test Framework in Javascript, using Selenium web-driver, Mocha, Chai etc.
innovative ideas in Grooming and Retro to scale the team velocity
Demo QA automation to stakeholders and executive management
Interview QA Engineers and Mentoring

work.summary: Healthcare, Providers, Optometrists, Opticians, Lens Makers
highlights: inculcate QA automation practices and processes
educate executive management about benefits of Automation
presentations and demos to top management
Automation test framework using NightwatchJS
UI e2e regression tests
API Tests using PostmanPro and Newman
brown-bag sessions about current technology
Agile Scrum team to create test plans for several web apps
oversaw Test suites for 7 high-volume public facing web apps
Automation Regression tests for several web apps
suggested and implemented automation using NightwatchJS
standardized manual testing procedures with Zephyr
implemented Accessibility Testing for all web apps using Jaws, TotalValidator
collaborated with DPS for CPA certifications for LTC and DLR apps
collaborated with DPS and Genesys for IVR systems and BDR
load testing using LoadedUI and Artillery
tested for Responsive Design for Mobile platform apps
as an automation adherent, inspired teams to achieve 95% automated tests using Jenkins, Spock, Mocha, Selenium, Robot and Nightwatch
Document QA new hire best practices
Mentored new hires

work.summary: Clinical Diagnostic and LifeScience industry, BioTechnology,LifeScience,Scientific Equipment Manufacturers
highlights: Luminex 100/200 System - analyzer built on xMAP technology to simultaneously measure up to 100 analytes in a single microplate
testing features of xPONENT Software, configuration, automation, connectivity and remote web monitoring
test behavior and functionality of Aries instrument software

ideated a SaaS Model Multitenant Application Management Tool using Grails, AngularJS and MongoDB stack that eliminated SDLC, so that product owners, business analysts and sales team could create and deploy tenant applications at runtime
real-time testing with meticulous configuring of hardware and software components to reduce error margins
Agile Scrum team
test various features of a multi-facet biotech application
real-time integration testing using hardware components
manual UI testing for positive and negative cases

ideated a SaaS Model Multitenant Application Management Tool using Grails, AngularJS and MongoDB stack that eliminated SDLC, so that product owners, business analysts and sales team could create and deploy tenant applications at runtime
